data.name: Baltoro High Gloss Hydraulic Storage White Bed

reasons_to_love_this_product.title: Easy-access hydraulic storage
reasons_to_love_this_product.description: With our easy pull-up, easy pull-down hydraulic mechanism, you can use ALL the space under the bed to store your stuff. The king-sized bed comes with 840 litres of storage, while the queen-sized variant comes with 700 litres.

reasons_to_love_this_product.title: Anti-creak joinery
reasons_to_love_this_product.description: We use high-strength clamps and joinery techniques specially designed for engineered wood beds. Ergo, no irksome creaks - and you can sleep like a baby, well into adulthood!

reasons_to_love_this_product.title: Sturdy laminate surfaces
reasons_to_love_this_product.description: We believe what's on the outside matters too. Which is why we use thicker laminate surfaces than most furniture-makers do. Our laminates are also scratch-resistant, anti-fungal, and less prone to peeling off.

reasons_to_love_this_product.title: High gloss, high style
reasons_to_love_this_product.description: Sophisticated, glossy, and refreshingly different, this bed brings out the beauty of pristine white against walnut.
